title: Ep. 442 - Pornhub Facilitates The Corruption And Abuse Of Children
description:
Today on the show, the world's largest porn site, Pornhub, exposes millions of young kids to hardcore porn. It makes no attempt to verify the ages of its users. Should it be required to? Also Five Headlines, including Biden's big wins last night, and Biden nearly getting into a fist fight with a voter who questioned him on gun rights. And in our Daily Cancellation, AOC says it's racist to avoid Chinese restaurants because of the coronavirus. This claim is stupid for about five different reasons. We'll explore them all. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
